title: Store Management System
description: A CUI based Store management system with Mysql database connectivty provides authentication, having multiple roles(admin,manager) , saves customer details, having feature of note making and play quiz for fun.

title: Formify:OCR Form Reader and Validator
techUsed: PHP | Optical Character Recognition (OCR) | API Integration
description: Formify leverages the power of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology to automate data extraction from paper-based forms and match details from the form using OCR and external API integration.

title: The Daily Quest Extension
description: 'The Daily Quest' extension, a captivating browser extension that provides daily insights, interesting and joyful coding output questions, stimulating your curiosity and expanding your knowledge of programming.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Designed and developed my personal portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, and experiences in the field of technology.

title: PAMAP2 Activity Classification
description: This project presents a comprehensive comparative analysis of various machine learning models for activity recognition using the PAMAP2 dataset. The primary objective is to evaluate and compare the performance of different machine learning classifiers in accurately classifying human activities based on sensor data.
